version_description:
1、New Content:
1.9 Update is coming! A brand new dynasty is waiting for you call!
a) Adding ‘5 Elements Stats’ development. 5 weapon skills (Dual Blades, Bow, Spear & Shield, Staff and Blade) have their corresponding 5 Elements Stats (Metal, Wood, Water, Fire and Earth). You can develop corresponding stats to restrict another.
b) New Mine gameplay: War never stops in Mine, Players can collect Mine on maps or by defeating monsters and BOSS to collect 5 Elements Materials!
c) Adding Bet to ‘King of Weapons’. Fiercest fight between weapons! You can sign up for your invincible weapon and each champion in 5 different kinds will win the title ‘King of Weapon’!
d) New Talisman Costume - Shark arrives! You will be the brightest star on battlefield!
e) New Privilege Weekly Card: Complete daily quest to claim it freely! You can grab 66 diamonds and time-limited costume daily!

2、Abundant Rewards!
a) After new update is released, we will hold various reward events, stay tuned! During events, there will be plenty of free diamonds, rare gems, hero spirits and cool costumes to claim. Don’t miss out!
b) Returned Hero Rewards: To welcome returned generals, we add Return System. You just need to finish easy quests to claim surprising rewards!

3、What’s improved
a) Optimized some game reward system and reward contents.
b) We added ‘instant finish’ in some daily quests to reduce stress.
c) Improved Jingzhou Battlefield, added extra Double Prestige Time and shortened open time to gather players.

4、Glitches Fixed
a) Fixed some known glitches.

【What is New?】
1、New Feature - Chat Bubble: A more impressive way to chat!
2、New System - Constellation Development: Inherited from ancient oriental magic, it enables your character to activate Constellation and embed Star Power to conquer the world!
3、New Gameplay - Pet Saga: to team up your pets and deploy them to adventure for secret Treasure!
4、In some events, rewards are doubled and greatly improved!
5、Fixed some bug.
